alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 9:03PM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Kachina Village, Munds Park, Payson, Pine-Strawberry, Shonto and Williams. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become nearly impossible on untreated roads due to snow and reduced visibility. Wind gusts over 45 mph could bring down tree branches. * SNOW TABLES...Snow forecast from 2 AM Sunday to 5 PM Sunday: Doney Park 3 to 5 inches Flagstaff 4 to 8 inches Forest Lakes 6 to 10 inches Heber-Overgaard 3 to 5 inches Kachina Village 5 to 9 inches Munds Park 7 to 11 inches Payson 4 to 8 inches Pine-Strawberry 6 to 10 inches Shonto 3 to 5 inches Williams 4 to 8 inches.
info.instruction: If travel is essential, allow for extra drive time and use caution. For the latest road conditions and closures...call the ADOT freeway management system at 1 888 411 7623 or visit their web site at www.az511.com. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
